ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS-2 SCM Search Coil Magnetometer Level-2 Burst Waveform (CDF)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data sets contains MMS-2 SCM (search coil magnetometer) calibrated AC magnetic field waveforms in the burst mode and GSE frame. These waveform data are sampled at (survey scsrvy=32 samples/s, brst scb=8192 samples/s, schb=16384 samples/s). They are high-pass filtered above (scsrvy = 0.5 Hz, scb = 1 Hz, schb = 32 Hz) but not low-pass filtered.
